description: Java entity class representing user notification preferences, including email, webhooks, and webhook URL, mapped to a database table.

classes.name: NotificationPreference
classes.description: Entity class managing user notification preferences with fields for email, webhooks, and webhook URL, mapped to the 'notification_preferences' database table.

methods.name: NotificationPreference
methods.description: Constructor initializing notification preferences for a specific user.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the notification preference.

methods.name: isEmailEnabled
methods.description: Checks if email notifications are enabled.

methods.name: isWebhooksEnabled
methods.description: Checks if webhook notifications are enabled.
